extendedInfo.description: Daily head to head arcade-style fantasy NFL matches with your friends or against the computer. Win in-game coins, level up, unlock power-ups, and more.  We support Fantasy Football, Fantasy Basketball, Fantasy Hockey, Fantasy Baseball and more coming!  Even if you have never played fantasy sports before, you will like it.  Visit our Facebook page for codes to get free power-ups!http://www.facebook.com/ForCoinsVoted the #1 Arcade-Style Fantasy Football Android gameVoted the #1 Arcade-Style Fantasy Basketball Android gameA new and fun spin on Fantasy NFL, NBA, and MLB.  NHL, NASCAR and more sports are coming soon.   It's not meant to take the place of an existing fantasy league.  Rather, you select a team anytime, even after live games have started.  It is a simple, fun, zero commitment game.  Earn in-game coins to unlock power-ups and have fun with your friends.  A totally different and fun take on Fantasy. Totally free! We also integrated Heyzap so you can play with your Heyzap friends!(Previously called "BIG Baller Fantasy Football")"âââââ This could become an innovative hit amongst mainstream fantasy sports fans. - Cameron, RotoGrinders.com Co-Founder"âââââ  "God himself couldn't make a better game. - Jim""âââââ It's a football dream - Chris ""âââââ Great app. Can be as quick and easy or as detailed as you want. Great for baseball fans to give live games a little more edge - Darren""âââââ Love fantasy, Love fantasy sports and this just adds another way to play thanks - Erin""âââââ Fun. Nice fantasy sports game, especially if you don't have the time to play in a season long league. - Maura""âââââ A must if you play Fantasy sports - Ed""âââââ Fun app! If you enjoy fantasy football and baseball you'll enjoy this - Chris"*** You speak, we listen! Now has a Non-Facebook sign in! ***Compete in real-time, DAILY fantasy sports matches with your friends. Win in-game coins, level up, unlock power-ups, and dominate your friends.  We support Fantasy Football, Fantasy Basketball, Fantasy Baseball and more coming!

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: The greatest fantasy sports app ever! NFL, NBA, MLB and NHL!! All covered here! Play against others with a friendly wager of coins! Create a team of the best players and watch them play live! So much fun! How well do you know your favorite players???

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: Not alot of competition for this game so i hope they continue to improve it as its still pretty rough. That said i love it as i can scratch that fantasy sports itch without pouring through tons of draft, waiver wire and trade bulk that usually accompanies it.
